title: What are the importance and uses of wireless broadband? - Quora

response.answer_text: Through wireless broadband, the wireless technology has presented a high speed internet receptiveness. Wireless broadband is completely independent of modem or ethernet connection. If the user has a phone line, the availability of wireless broadband would be possible. Within your premises, a wireless broadband can cover wide area. Satellite, WIFI, WI MAX, fixed wireless technology- are the base of this wireless broadband. Adaptability is the main plus point of wireless broadband. It provides the user an opportunity to download data quickly. 60GHz wireless band is taken as a common technology option for small cell backhaul. It is less expensive than traditional backhaul method.
